Bash(git commit -m "Initial release of MenuTemp v1.0.0

🌡️ MenuTemp - Mac Temperature Monitor

A cute, lightweight menu bar temperature monitor for macOS that displays 
real-time CPU temperature with beautiful color-coded indicators.

Features:
- Real-time CPU temperature monitoring
- Temperature unit toggle (°F ↔ °C) with persistent preference
- Color-coded display (blue/yellow/orange/red)
- Cute thermometer icon in Details dialog
- Auto-updates every 30 seconds
- Menu bar only (no Dock icon)
- Keyboard shortcuts (⌘D, ⌘U, ⌘Q)
- Smart fallback to CPU power display

🤖 Generated with Claude Code

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>")
Bash(gh repo create menutemp --public --description "🌡️ A cute, lightweight menu bar temperature monitor for macOS with color-coded indicators" --source=. --remote=origin)

Bash(gh release create v1.0.0 MenuTemp-v1.0.zip --title "MenuTemp v1.0.0 - Initial Release 🌡️" --notes "# MenuTemp v1.0.0 - Initial Release 🌡️

A cute, lightweight menu bar temperature monitor for macOS.

## What''s New
✨ First public release of MenuTemp!

- Real-time CPU temperature monitoring
- Toggle between Fahrenheit and Celsius
- Color-coded temperature display (blue/yellow/orange/red)
- Cute thermometer icon in Details dialog
- Lightweight and native macOS design
- Auto-updates every 30 seconds
- Menu bar only (no Dock icon)

## Installation
1. Download \`MenuTemp-v1.0.zip\` below
2. Unzip and drag MenuTemp.app to Applications
3. Open MenuTemp from Applications
4. Enjoy! 🌡️

## System Requirements
- macOS 11.0 (Big Sur) or later
- Apple Silicon (arm64)
- Python 3.x (included with macOS)

## Features
- 🌡️ Real-time temperature monitoring
- 🔄 Temperature unit toggle (°F ↔ °C)
- 🎨 Color-coded indicators
- ⌨️ Keyboard shortcuts (⌘D, ⌘U, ⌘Q)
- 💾 Persistent preferences
- ⚡ Smart fallback to CPU power

## Download
See assets below ⬇️

Full documentation: [README.md](https://github.com/danielalanbates/menutemp#readme)

---
